short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension adds a 'Video' button to YouTube Shorts, allowing users to watch the short as a full video with a single click.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This Chrome extension enhances the YouTube Shorts viewing experience by automatically detecting when a user is watching a YouTube Short. It maintains a history of the last three viewed Shorts, ensuring easy navigation without overcrowding the browsing history. Additionally, it introduces a "Video" button to the Shorts interface, allowing users to instantly navigate to the full version of the video (if available) in a new tab. The button's appearance adapts to the browser's light or dark mode, ensuring a seamless integration with YouTube's UI. Ideal for users looking to streamline their Shorts viewing and quickly access full video content.
